sparseMarkov 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Reference

    All functions

    base_Sj()

    Makes a table with certain sequencies in sample and their frequencies.

    base_Sja()

    Makes a table with certain sequencies in sample and their frequencies.

    checkSample()

    Checks if a sample is suitable for use

    dTV()

    Total variation distance between distributions given x_S

    is_xS()

    Checks which row in data frame is equal to a vector

    PI()

    Estimated stationary distribution vector for every a_j and a sequence x_S

    shapeSample()

    Creates a table with sample information

    sparseMarkov()

    A function for inference in sparse Markov chains

    sparseMarkov_CUT()

    Aplies Cut algorithm

    sparseMarkov_FS()

    Aplies Forward Stepwise (FS) algorithm

    sx()

    Calculates sx

    test_chain

    A chain for testing the package

    txy()

    Calculates txy
